Extracted Variables:
- \( x_1 \): Number of commercials on Pi TV
- \( x_2 \): Number of commercials on Beta Video
- \( x_3 \): Number of commercials on Gamma Live

Extracted Constraints:
- \( x_1 + x_2 + x_3 \leq 8 \) (Limit on the number of commercials on Beta Video)
- \( x_3 \leq \frac{1}{3}(x_1 + x_2 + x_3) \) (At most a third of all commercials on Gamma Live)
- \( x_1 \geq 0.2(x_1 + x_2 + x_3) \) (Minimum of 20% of all commercials on Pi TV)
- \( 1200x_1 + 2000x_2 + 4000x_3 \leq 20000 \) (Budget constraint)

Extracted Objective:
Maximize \( 2000x_1 + 5000x_2 + 9000x_3 \) (Maximizing audience reach)
